2025-08-01.history: St. Alphonsus Liguori (1696–1787), founder of the Redemptorists.
2025-08-01.reflection: Lord, teach me to choose mercy in all things.

2025-08-02.history: Eusebius defended the Nicene faith; Eymard fostered Eucharistic adoration.
2025-08-02.reflection: Jesus, deepen my love for Your Eucharistic Heart.

2025-08-04.history: The Curé of Ars renewed parish life through confession and prayer.
2025-08-04.reflection: Grant me fidelity in the small duties that sanctify.

2025-08-05.history: St. Mary Major is Rome’s oldest Marian church.
2025-08-05.reflection: Mary, lead me to adore your Son with a childlike heart.

2025-08-06.history: Christ revealed His glory on the holy mountain.
2025-08-06.reflection: Open my ears to Your Word; transfigure my heart.

2025-08-08.history: Dominic founded the Order of Preachers to proclaim truth with love.
2025-08-08.reflection: Spirit of Truth, guide my words for Your glory.

2025-08-10.history: Deacon Lawrence served the poor and sealed his witness with martyrdom.
2025-08-10.reflection: Let me see the poor as Your treasure, Lord.

2025-08-11.history: Clare embraced poverty and contemplation, mirroring Francis.
2025-08-11.reflection: Free my heart from clutter so I may cling to You.

2025-08-14.history: Kolbe offered his life in Auschwitz for a fellow prisoner.
2025-08-14.reflection: Make my love courageous and sacrificial.

2025-08-15.history: The Assumption celebrates Mary taken body and soul into glory.
2025-08-15.reflection: Mary, raise my thoughts to the things of heaven.

2025-08-20.history: Bernard preached Christ with burning charity.
2025-08-20.reflection: Inflame my heart with love for Jesus.

2025-08-22.history: Mary shares in Christ’s kingship as Queen and Mother.
2025-08-22.reflection: Reign in my thoughts, words, and deeds.

2025-08-24.history: Bartholomew preached the Gospel; tradition recounts his martyrdom.
2025-08-24.reflection: Give me courage to witness faithfully.

2025-08-27.history: Monica persevered in prayer for Augustine’s conversion.
2025-08-27.reflection: Strengthen my intercession for loved ones.

2025-08-28.history: Augustine, Doctor of grace, illumined minds with his writings.
2025-08-28.reflection: Our hearts are restless until they rest in You.

2025-08-29.history: John the Baptist bore witness to truth unto death.
2025-08-29.reflection: Grant me purity and courage of heart.

2025-09-03.history: Gregory the Great reformed worship and served the poor.
2025-09-03.reflection: Make me a servant-leader after Your Heart.

2025-09-08.history: Mary’s birth heralds the dawn of salvation.
2025-09-08.reflection: Let my life proclaim Your goodness like Mary’s.

2025-09-12.history: The Holy Name of Mary is a sign of trust and love.
2025-09-12.reflection: Mary, be near me in trial.

2025-09-13.history: Chrysostom, golden-mouthed preacher, taught bold charity and truth.
2025-09-13.reflection: Sanctify my speech, Lord, to heal and enlighten.

2025-09-14.history: The Cross is the sign of victory and life.
2025-09-14.reflection: We adore You, O Christ, and we bless You.

2025-09-15.history: Mary shares intimately in her Son’s Passion.
2025-09-15.reflection: Mother of Sorrows, keep me faithful beneath the Cross.

2025-09-16.history: Cornelius and Cyprian shepherded the Church in persecution.
2025-09-16.reflection: Unite my heart to the suffering Body of Christ.

2025-09-17.history: Robert Bellarmine served truth with learning and humility.
2025-09-17.reflection: Join knowledge with charity in me, Lord.

2025-09-20.history: Korean Martyrs witnessed to Christ with heroic faith.
2025-09-20.reflection: Strengthen persecuted Christians and my own faith.

2025-09-21.history: Matthew answered Jesus’ call and became Evangelist.
2025-09-21.reflection: Make me swift to rise and follow You.

2025-09-23.history: Padre Pio ministered reconciliation and healing.
2025-09-23.reflection: Make me an instrument of Your mercy.

2025-09-26.history: Cosmas and Damian served as physician-martyrs.
2025-09-26.reflection: Teach me to serve without counting the cost.

2025-09-27.history: Vincent de Paul organized effective charity for the poor.
2025-09-27.reflection: Let my love be practical and joyful.

2025-09-29.history: Archangels Michael, Gabriel, Raphael: defender, messenger, healer.
2025-09-29.reflection: Guard, guide, and heal me according to God’s will.
